name: Space Lift Danger Panic!
synopsis: Fire portals and save people in this science-fiction reaction-testing hyper-arcade game! The Ceranthian's have been using their space lift to travel between the surface of their home planet and low orbit, where they go about their daily work. A series of attacks on their planet have culminated with the unleashing of a space weapon inside the lift putting all the travellers in deadly peril. Your job is to use a teleportation cannon to fire portals into the traveller’s path and transport them to safety. It will be tough, but you are the Ceranthian's only hope! Features: • Play through an epic mode that tests your reactions to their limits across 40 levels. • Challenge you friends in survival mode, where the real test awaits! Can you reach the top of the leaderboards and claim global victory? • From the makers of the hit game Tiny Dice Dungeon comes their first game on Nintendo 3DS™!
